mapper.select: SELECT A.sys_user_id AS sysUserId, sys_user_nickname AS sysUserNickname, sys_user_phone AS sysUserPhone, sys_user_email AS sysUserEmail, sys_user_sex AS sysUserSex, sys_user_username AS sysUserUsername, sys_user_icon AS sysUserIcon, sys_user_key AS sysUserKey, sys_user_introduction AS sysUserIntroduction, COUNT(DISTINCT B.article_id) AS articleCount, COALESCE(SUM(DISTINCT article_browse_sum), 0) AS articleBrowseSum, COUNT(DISTINCT sys_article_praise_id) AS articlePraise, A.created AS created, A.updated AS updated FROM sys_user A LEFT JOIN sys_article B ON A.sys_user_id = B.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_article_praise C ON A.sys_user_id = C.sys_user_id WHERE sys_user_type = 1 AND sys_user_status = 1 GROUP BY A.sys_user_id ORDER BY ${vo.keyWord} ${vo.orderBy}

SELECT A.sys_user_id AS sysUserId, sys_user_nickname AS sysUserNickname, sys_user_phone AS sysUserPhone, sys_user_email AS sysUserEmail, sys_user_sex AS sysUserSex, sys_user_username AS sysUserUsername, sys_user_icon AS sysUserIcon, sys_user_key AS sysUserKey, sys_user_introduction AS sysUserIntroduction, COUNT(DISTINCT B.article_id) AS articleCount, COALESCE(SUM(DISTINCT article_browse_sum), 0) AS articleBrowseSum, COUNT(DISTINCT sys_article_praise_id) AS articlePraise, A.created AS created, A.updated AS updated FROM sys_user A LEFT JOIN sys_article B ON A.sys_user_id = B.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_article_praise C ON A.sys_user_id = C.sys_user_id WHERE sys_user_type = 1 AND sys_user_status = 1
AND sys_user_nickname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchVO.sysUserNickname}), '%')
AND sys_user_username LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchVO.sysUserUsername}), '%')
AND sys_user_phone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchVO.sysUserPhone}), '%')
AND sys_user_email LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchVO.sysUserEmail}), '%')
GROUP BY A.sys_user_id ORDER BY ${queryVO.keyWord} ${queryVO.orderBy}

SELECT A.sys_user_id AS sysUserId, sys_user_nickname AS sysUserNickname, sys_user_phone AS sysUserPhone, sys_user_email AS sysUserEmail, sys_user_sex AS sysUserSex, sys_user_username AS sysUserUsername, sys_user_icon AS sysUserIcon, sys_user_key AS sysUserKey, sys_user_introduction AS sysUserIntroduction, COUNT(DISTINCT B.article_id) AS articleCount, COALESCE(SUM(DISTINCT article_browse_sum), 0) AS articleBrowseSum, COUNT(DISTINCT sys_article_praise_id) AS articlePraise, A.created AS created, A.updated AS updated FROM sys_user A LEFT JOIN sys_article B ON A.sys_user_id = B.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_article_praise C ON A.sys_user_id = C.sys_user_id WHERE sys_user_type = 1 AND sys_user_status = 1 AND A.sys_user_id = #{sysUserId} GROUP BY A.sys_user_id

SELECT sys_user_id AS sysUerId, sys_user_nickname AS sysUserNickname, sys_user_username AS sysUserUsername, sys_user_icon AS sysUserIcon, sys_user_key AS sysUserKey, updated AS updated, created AS created FROM sys_user WHERE sys_user_id = #{sysUserId} AND sys_user_type = 2 AND sys_user_status = 1

( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT article_id) AS count, 'article' AS type FROM sys_article ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sys_user_id) AS count, 'user' AS type FROM sys_user WHERE sys_user_type = 1 AND sys_user_status = 1 )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sys_user_id) AS articleCount FROM sys_user WHERE 1 = 1
AND created > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND created > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK)
AND created > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
AND created > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sys_user_id) AS '用户数量', #{monthStr} AS month FROM sys_user WHERE DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y') = #{year} AND DATE_FORMAT(created, '%m') = #{month} AND sys_user_type = 1 AND sys_user_status = 1
